message: 'package' should be separated from previous statement.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - com.google.common.collect.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - com.griddynamics.jagger.coordinator.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - java.util.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - java.util.concurrent.*.
WhitespaceAround: '*' is not preceded with whitespace.
WhitespaceAround: '*' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
